name: lip butter
description: this double butter extra moisturizing and conditioning lip butter is excellent for extremely dry cracked lips.  it is rich in vitamin e, promotes cell regeneration, penetrates deep into the skin and locks in moisture.  for best results apply overnight to clean lips.  contains shea butter, mango butter, kukui nut oil, apricot kernel oil, beeswax and vanilla.

name: deodorant
description:
this all natural deodorant is excellent for those who are looking for a deodorant that works and does not contain all the extra added ingredients.  it is paraben free and aluminum free.  contains beeswax, coconut oil, cocoa butter, stearic acid, clay, sodium bicarbonate, cornstarch,  vitamin e, jojoba oil, castor oil and essential oil blend. 
it has a slight citrus scent.

2.5 ounces

name: 2 1/2lb soap loaf
description:
buy a 2 1/2lb soap loaf of your favorite scent.  you can get 8 one inch thick slices or slice it as thick or as thin as you like.  you can make your own label and sell it or give to family and friends as gifts.  the choice is yours.

8in x 3 1/2in x 2 1/4in

loaf will be shipped 3-4 weeks after order is placed due to curing time

name: lotion trio
description:
try layering!   after cleasing with the handmade soap, moisturize your skin with the handmade silky smooth lotion.

set includes one 8.5 ounce lotion and two 5 ounce bars of soap

name: shea butter with argan oil
description:
shea butter is a solid fatty oil made form the nut of the karite tree grown in africa and argan oil is derived from the argania spinosa tree grown in morocco.  shea butter and argan oil blended is rich in vitamin e, promotes cell regeneration, is rich in antioxidants, nourishing and helps prevent moisture loss from the skin.  it is also one of the better natural moisturizers for extremely dry, cracked skin.

4 ounces

name: body butter trio
description:
try layering!  after cleansing with the handmade soap, moisturize your skin with the handmade triple butter body butter.

set includes a 4 ounce jar of body butter and two 5 ounce bars of soap
